hero.title: Your Global Visa Journey Starts Here
hero.subtitle: Prepare visa applications for the US, Schengen Area, UK, Canada, Japan, Australia, and New Zealand. Step-by-step guidance, document checklists, and support from start to finish.

install.pitch: Install for faster access, one-tap tracking, and instant support updates.
install.success: App added. You can now open Visamn from your home screen.
install.iosSteps: Tap Share in Safari, then choose 'Add to Home Screen'.
install.unavailableDesc: Open this site in Safari or Chrome and use browser menu → Add to Home Screen.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Visa Journey?
cta.subtitle: Join applicants who use visamn to prepare accurate visa applications with confidence.

hero.subtitle: We simplify visa application preparation with guided steps, clear checklists, and support for multiple destinations.

features.subtitle: Our platform is designed to make your visa application experience as smooth as possible.

saveTime.title: Save Time
saveTime.description: Our guided process helps you prepare applications faster with fewer errors than doing it alone.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: An online service for busy travelers: prepare your application, track progress, and get support when you need it.

createAccount.title: Create Account
createAccount.description: Sign up for free and access our guided application builder with auto-save functionality.

fillApplication.title: Choose Destination & Fill Details
fillApplication.description: Select where you're applying and complete each section with step-by-step guidance.

submitTrack.title: Submit & Track
submitTrack.description: Review and export your application and track it through your dashboard. Appointment availability varies by location (US, Schengen, and other destinations) and earlier slots can sometimes open within 1-2 days. Express support (if selected) adds +15% to the service fee.

prepareDocs.title: Prepare Documents
prepareDocs.description: Finalize your checklist, translations, and appointment-ready document package. You'll receive updates and next steps in your inbox.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Application?
cta.subtitle: Join applicants who use our platform to prepare visa applications faster and with fewer errors.

hero.subtitle: Compare typical government fees, interview requirements, and processing timelines for popular destinations. Service pricing depends on destination complexity and support level.

fees.title: Fees by Destination
fees.subtitle: Government fees vary by visa type and can change. Use this as a quick reference and confirm on official embassy/consulate websites.
fees.serviceFeeNote: Includes guided form, document checklist, and support.

processingByCountry.USA: Appointment availability varies by location; visa processing is typically 1-2 weeks after interview
processingByCountry.SCHENGEN: Usually 15-30 calendar days, may extend to 60 days in peak season
processingByCountry.CANADA: Usually 2-8 weeks depending on visa type and country of residence
processingByCountry.JAPAN: Usually 5-7 business days for tourist visa, longer for work/student visas
processingByCountry.UK: Usually 3-6 weeks standard, priority service available
processingByCountry.AUSTRALIA: Usually 20-30 days for visitor visa, varies by visa type
processingByCountry.NEW_ZEALAND: Usually 20-25 working days for visitor visa

fees.disclaimer: We are not affiliated with any government agency. Fees and timelines may change. Converted amounts are estimates (FX updated: {{date}}).

insights.title: Key Insights
insights.item1: Mongolia's approval rate has increased by 3% compared to the previous year
insights.item2: B1/B2 tourist visas remain the most commonly applied category
insights.item3: Complete documentation significantly improves approval chances

tips.title: Tips to Improve Your Approval Chances

documentation.title: Complete Documentation
documentation.description: Ensure all required documents are accurate, up-to-date, and properly organized before your interview.

ties.title: Strong Ties to Home
ties.description: Demonstrate reasons you will return home: work, family, study, property, or ongoing commitments.

purpose.title: Clear Travel Purpose
purpose.description: Articulate a specific, legitimate reason for your trip with supporting documentation.

finances.title: Financial Stability
finances.description: Show sufficient funds through bank statements and proof of income to cover your trip expenses.

honesty.title: Honest Answers
honesty.description: Always provide truthful information. Inconsistencies can lead to immediate denial.

appearance.title: Professional Preparation
appearance.description: Prepare a short explanation of your trip, review your documents, and arrive early for biometrics/interview.

selectCountry.whyMattersDescription: Each country has different visa requirements, document checklists, and application forms. By selecting your destination country upfront, we can:
selectCountry.benefit1: Show you the exact documents you'll need
selectCountry.benefit2: Guide you through country-specific form sections
